messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the faulty wiring in your AI we terminated it's memory core have a nice day

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we saved your SM from delemation it's at 10%

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: you SM is at 13% and rising have a nice day

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vacant Office B.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: your SM is delemating again and we can't fix it this time... godspeed

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we are sending in last resort standby

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: pay respects to the ERT engineer that kamakazied the SM into submission

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: that other command report was pretty important someone should read it

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a horde of [REDACTED] have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Technical Storage.
